InstallationÔÉÅ

Installation via Github repository: - Unzip the package - Rename directory from FleetRL-master to FleetRL - cd FleetRL - pip install -r requirements.txt

Notes: - On remote environments on vast.ai it can be necessary to run pip install -U numpy prior to installing FleetRL
